titleStmt.title: Ordered by the Commons assembled in Parliament that no master or commander of any ship shall be permitted to pass or transport any sea-men or mariners ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Field for Edward Husband ...,

notesStmt.note: At head of title: Die Veneris, 16 Martii, 1648.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
With: Ordered by the Commons assembled in Parliament that no pass or license whatsoever shall be granted to any person or persons to go beyond the seas ...
